desc: Short for ar!server top members
Shows the Server toplist for the specified type
Shows your own stats
Shows the stats of the specified user
Shows top channels for a specific user in a certain timearea
Shows the most active channels
Shows the most active channels for a period of time
Shows the alltime most active users of the current channel
Shows the most active users in the specified channel of the specified time
"Likes" an User - Gives XP - also see Server Settings -> "VoteTag", "VoteEmote" and "ReactionVote"
Set the mentioned User as Inviter of you
Shows the main settings of your Server
Shows the Levels and their needed XP for your Server
Shows the Roles you have set up for Levels on your Server
Shows which Channels are set to "no XP"
Shows which Roles are set to "no XP"
Shows your set Messages
Shows Information about the user
See how to earn Token by upvoting the Bot on external Server listings
Get the website URL to buy tokens
Redeem Tokens to double your voting/like power (10 Token for 3 days)
Fuel Token into the Server to get some perks (for more info use ar!help token or ar!token get buy)
Toggle your own settings if you want to receive DMs from the Bot or not (in case ar!server set notifyLevelupDm is set to on)
enables or disables if your reactions count as uservotes
Shows the FAQ
Shows all Patchnotes
Shows details about a certain patchnote version
Changes the prefix from 'ar!' to a custom one. 1 to 32 letters possible
(Toggle) Either activates or deactives the specific XP type completely
Changes the VoteTag from 'likes' to a custom word
Changes the VoteEmote from a red heart to a custom Emoji
Changes the BonusTag from 'bonus' to a custom word
Changes the BonusEmote from a trophy to a custom Emoji
Entries shown per page in almost every Embed
Enable this to show user Nicknames instead of usernames in the stats
Define one channel where commands are allowed (all other channels get ignored)
Define specific channels where commands can't be used (but still can be read)
(Toggle) Levelup message via DM (priority: current channel > autopost channel > direct message)
(Toggle) Levelup message appears in the current channel the user was writing in or not (priority: current channel > autopost channel > direct message)
(Toggle) Only send the Roleassign message without Levelup message
Message to appear when someone got a Levelup - <mention>, <name>, <level>, <servername>
enables or disables the voting via reaction
XP needed per Level (Base 100 XP + levelFactor*level). Needs to be within 20 and 400
Maximum is 10 XP per textmessage, 5 XP per voiceminute, 100 XP per upvote, 1000 XP per Invite
Can range from 180 (3 minutes) to 86400 seconds (24 hours)
Can range from 0 to 120 seconds
(Toggle) Allow or disallow users to gain XP while being muted in a voicechannel
(Toggle) Allow or disallow users to gain XP while being deafened in a voicechannel
(Toggle) Allow or disallow users to gain XP in a voicechannel while being alone (Bots don't count as user)
(Toggle) Allow or disallow users to gain XP while being Invisible (marked as offline)
replace: removed due to excessive resource use

desc: Maximum of 100 for upvotes, 20 for textmessages and 10 for voiceminutes
Mininum of 0 to maximum 4320 minutes (= 72 hours)
(Toggle) Sets specific channel (text or voice) to gain or not gain XP
(Toggle) Sets specific roles to gain or not gain XP
Give bonus XP to a user. Maximum 1.000.000 at once.
Sets a role to be assigned at level x (has to be lower than deassign!)
Sets a role to be deassigned at level x (has to be higher than assign!)
Custom message to appear when Role gets assigned - <mention>, <name>, <level>,<servername>, <rolename>
Custom message to appear when Role gets deassigned - <mention>, <name>, <level>, <servername>, <rolename>
Standard message to appear when a Role gets assigned - <mention>, <name>, <level>, <servername>, <rolename>
Standard message to appear when a Role gets deassigned - <mention>, <name>, <level>, <servername>, <rolename>
(Toggle) This will have roles be removed if the user is at a lower level than the set assignlevel
Sets a Channel to post Join messages
Sets a channel to post Levelup Messages - (priority: current channel > autopost channel > direct message)
Message to appear when someone joins the Server - <mention>, <name>, <servername>
Message to appear when someone got a Levelup - <mention>, <name>, <level>, <servername>
Reset all Stats, Settings or everything

old: ar!server reset {textStats | voiceStats | inviteStats | voteStats | bonusStats}
desc: Reset the specific kind of Stats for everyone
Reset left/deleted User or deleted Channel
Reset Stats of a specific Channel
Reset Stats of a specific User
